arms-reach.errorNoDsProperty: No 'ds' property found for value '${wallDataDs}' for id : '${wallDDataId}'
arms-reach.settingHintEnableArmsReachFea: Enable the GM to select the maximum distance that players can interact with a door
arms-reach.settingHintNotificationsFaile: Emit notifications for when a player fails to interact with a door. Good for debugging.
arms-reach.settingNameGlobalMaximumInter: [Not Recommended] Global maximum interaction distance in grids
arms-reach.settingHintGlobalMaximumInter: [I do not recommend this feature use instead 'Global maximum interaction distance measurement' more 'Drag Ruler' perspective], 0 will disable this setting limit (needs app reload), if a value > 0 is used it will ignore the value of the setting 'Global maximum interaction distance measurement'. Max distance (in tiles) that a token can interact with a (door, journal, ...). GM's ignore this distance limitation.
arms-reach.settingNameGlobalMaximumInter: Global maximum interaction distance measurement (ft, mt, ...), support Hex Grid,Gridless and Difficult Terrain Ruler
arms-reach.settingHintGlobalMaximumInter: Max distance (in feet, meter, or the default system unit grid you are using) that a token can interact with a placeable object (door, journal, ...), 0 will disable the limit (needs app reload). GM's ignore this distance limitation.
arms-reach.settingNameHotKeyForInteracti: [Not Recommended] Interaction door with the hotkey 'e'
arms-reach.settingHintHotKeyForInteracti: [I do not recommend this feature because of some incompatibility with other movement verification modules, but otherwise it works] Pressing 'e' will open or close nearest door. Holding 'e' will center camera on current token.
arms-reach.settingNameDoubleTapInteracti: [Not Recommended] Interaction door with double tap delay in seconds
arms-reach.settingHintDoubleTapInteracti: [I do not recommend this feature because of some incompatibility with other movement verification modules, but otherwise it works] Double tapping a move key on the direction of a door will interact with it. This option sets the delay between required key presses (the lower the faster you need to tap). Setting this option to zero will disable interaction with double tap.
arms-reach.settingHintHotKeyToCenterCame: [I do not recommend this feature because of some incompatibility with other movement verification modules, but otherwise it works] Holding 'e' will center the camera on current selected token.
arms-reach.settingNameDisableDoorSound: Disable sound of the door if is not reachable
arms-reach.settingHintDisableDoorSound: This feature is only for door, if enabled this setting will disable the door sound interaction if is not in reach
arms-reach.settingNameNotificationsFaile: Notifications failed interactions even for GM
arms-reach.settingHintNotificationsFaile: Emit notifications for fails the distance interaction even for GM. Good for debugging. If no token is selected and you are a GM this feature is not activated
arms-reach.settingNameAvoidSelectsTheCon: Avoid deselects the controlled token when open/close the door
arms-reach.settingHintAvoidSelectsTheCon: Avoid deselects the controlled token if opening the door with a mouse click and 'Left-Click to Release Objects' is checked in the Core
arms-reach.settingNameUseOwnedTokenIfNoT: Use the owned tokens if no tokens is selected
arms-reach.settingHintUseOwnedTokenIfNoT: Use the owned tokens if no tokens is selected, make sense for player when usually there is only owned token
arms-reach.settingHintAutoCheckElevation: By default a check on the elevation between placeable objects is been done, can be useful with module like 'levels'
arms-reach.settingHintSetDistanceModeFor: Set Distance Mode for Door distance interaction
arms-reach.settingHintShowDoorIconsFeatu: Default behavior hides Door Icons on the Walls layer. This makes them stay visible.
arms-reach.settingHintStairwaysIntegrati: Max distance that a token can interact with a stairway... 0 will disable the limit (needs app reload). GM's ignore this distance limitation.
arms-reach.settingNameGlobalInteractionD: Enable the check distance on Stairways even for GM
arms-reach.settingHintGlobalInteractionD: If enabled it will apply the check of the distance on Stairways even for GM, useful if the GM want to play as a player.
arms-reach.settingHintGridlessSupportFea: Instead of calculate the distance by square grid unit, the calculation is based on the unit meele reach of the token 'ft' or 'mt'
arms-reach.settingHintTaggerIntegrationF: All the distance calculation are limited now to placeable object with the 'armsreach' tag on it. Remember you need to activate the tagger module for this
arms-reach.settingHintTaggerStairwayInte: All the distance calculation are limited now to placeable object with the 'armsreach' tag on it. Remember you need to activate the tagger module for this
arms-reach.settingHintTaggerTokenIntegra: All the distance calculation are limited now to placeable object with the 'armsreach' tag on it. Remember you need to activate the tagger module for this
arms-reach.settingHintTaggerNoteIntegrat: All the distance calculation are limited now to placeable object with the 'armsreach' tag on it. Remember you need to activate the tagger module for this
arms-reach.settingHintTaggerLightIntegra: All the distance calculation are limited now to placeable object with the 'armsreach' tag on it. Remember you need to activate the tagger module for this
arms-reach.settingHintTaggerSoundIntegra: All the distance calculation are limited now to placeable object with the 'armsreach' tag on it. Remember you need to activate the tagger module for this
arms-reach.settingHintTaggerDrawingInteg: All the distance calculation are limited now to placeable object with the 'armsreach' tag on it. Remember you need to activate the tagger module for this
arms-reach.settingHintTaggerTileIntegrat: All the distance calculation are limited now to placeable object with the 'armsreach' tag on it. Remember you need to activate the tagger module for this
arms-reach.settingHintTaggerWallIntegrat: All the distance calculation are limited now to placeable object with the 'armsreach' tag on it. Remember you need to activate the tagger module for this
arms-reach.settingHintResetDoorsAndFogFe: Add a voice on context menu for close all the doors and reset the fog on a scene
arms-reach.settingHintDoorsIntegrationFe: Max distance that a token can interact with a door... 0 will disable the limit (needs app reload). GM's ignore this distance limitation.
arms-reach.settingNameGlobalInteractionD: Enable the check distance on Doors even for GM
arms-reach.settingHintGlobalInteractionD: If enabled it will apply the check of the distance on Doors even for GM, useful if the GM want to play as a player.
arms-reach.settingHintJournalsIntegratio: Max distance that a token can interact with a journal... 0 will disable the limit (needs app reload). GM's ignore this distance limitation.
arms-reach.settingNameGlobalInteractionD: Enable the check distance on Notes even for GM
arms-reach.settingHintGlobalInteractionD: If enabled it will apply the check of the distance on Notes even for GM, useful if the GM want to play as a player.
arms-reach.settingHintNotesIntegrationFe: Max distance that a token can interact with a note... 0 will disable the limit (needs app reload). GM's ignore this distance limitation.
arms-reach.settingHintTokensIntegrationF: Max distance that a token can interact with a other token... 0 will disable the limit (needs app reload). GM's ignore this distance limitation.
arms-reach.settingNameGlobalInteractionD: Enable the check distance on Tokens even for GM
arms-reach.settingHintGlobalInteractionD: If enabled it will apply the check of the distance on Tokens even for GM, useful if the GM want to play as a player.
arms-reach.settingNameTokensIntegrationW: Enable the distance interaction for 'Loot Sheet NPC 5E'
arms-reach.settingHintTokensIntegrationW: If true by default enable the distance integration for all the token with the 'LootSheet' sheet active (https://foundryvtt.com/packages/lootsheetnpc5e)
arms-reach.settingNameTokensIntegrationB: Enable the distance interaction on target token with a specific name prefix
arms-reach.settingHintTokensIntegrationB: If true by default enable the distance integration for all the target token with the prefix setted on the name of the token (not the character name)
arms-reach.settingNameTokensIntegrationE: Set the name of the source token you want to use for the iteraction
arms-reach.settingHintTokensIntegrationE: The name of the source token setted here is the one used for the distance interaction with the target token (not the character name). By default is the character name linked to the user
arms-reach.settingHintLightsIntegrationF: Max distance that a Light can interact with a other token... 0 will disable the limit (needs app reload). GM's ignore this distance limitation.
arms-reach.settingNameGlobalInteractionD: Enable the check distance on Lights even for GM
arms-reach.settingHintGlobalInteractionD: If enabled it will apply the check of the distance on Lights even for GM, useful if the GM want to play as a player.
arms-reach.settingHintSoundsIntegrationF: Max distance that a Sound can interact with a other token... 0 will disable the limit (needs app reload). GM's ignore this distance limitation.
arms-reach.settingNameGlobalInteractionD: Enable the check distance on Sounds even for GM
arms-reach.settingHintGlobalInteractionD: If enabled it will apply the check of the distance on Sounds even for GM, useful if the GM want to play as a player.
arms-reach.settingHintDrawingsIntegratio: Max distance that a Drawing can interact with a other token... 0 will disable the limit (needs app reload). GM's ignore this distance limitation.
arms-reach.settingNameGlobalInteractionD: Enable the check distance on Drawings even for GM
arms-reach.settingHintGlobalInteractionD: If enabled it will apply the check of the distance on Drawings even for GM, useful if the GM want to play as a player.
arms-reach.settingHintTilesIntegrationFe: Max distance that a Tile can interact with a other token... 0 will disable the limit (needs app reload). GM's ignore this distance limitation.
arms-reach.settingNameGlobalInteractionD: Enable the check distance on Tiles even for GM
arms-reach.settingHintGlobalInteractionD: If enabled it will apply the check of the distance on Tiles even for GM, useful if the GM want to play as a player.
arms-reach.settingHintWallsIntegrationFe: Max distance that a Wall can interact with a other token... 0 will disable the limit (needs app reload). GM's ignore this distance limitation.
arms-reach.settingNameGlobalInteractionD: Enable the check distance on Walls even for GM
arms-reach.settingHintGlobalInteractionD: If enabled it will apply the check of the distance on Walls even for GM, useful if the GM want to play as a player.
arms-reach.settingHintTemplatesIntegrati: Max distance that a Template can interact with a other token... 0 will disable the limit (needs app reload). GM's ignore this distance limitation.
arms-reach.settingNameGlobalInteractionD: Enable the check distance on Templates even for GM
arms-reach.settingHintGlobalInteractionD: If enabled it will apply the check of the distance on Templates even for GM, useful if the GM want to play as a player.
arms-reach.settingNameEnableInteractionF: Enable interaction for user owner rather than token owner
arms-reach.settingHintEnableInteractionF: An option to check if the currently selected token is owned by said User rather than a specific token? This way you can log the players in as user and whichever owned token is selected will be able to walk up to a door and hit "e" or double tap the arrow to get the door to open.
arms-reach.settingNameMaximumDoorMeasure: Maximum door interaction distance measurement (ft, mt, ...)
arms-reach.settingHintMaximumDoorMeasure: Is the distance calculation used only for the door interaction
arms-reach.settingNameMaximumStairwayMea: Maximum stairway interaction distance measurement (ft, mt, ...),
arms-reach.settingHintMaximumStairwayMea: Is the distance calculation used only for the stairway
arms-reach.settingNameMaximumNoteMeasure: Maximum note interaction distance measurement (ft, mt, ...),
arms-reach.settingHintMaximumNoteMeasure: Is the distance calculation used only for the note
arms-reach.settingNameMaximumTokenMeasur: Maximum token interaction distance measurement (ft, mt, ...),
arms-reach.settingHintMaximumTokenMeasur: Is the distance calculation used only for the token
arms-reach.settingNameMaximumLightMeasur: Maximum light interaction distance measurement (ft, mt, ...),
arms-reach.settingHintMaximumLightMeasur: Is the distance calculation used only for the light
arms-reach.settingNameMaximumSoundMeasur: Maximum sound interaction distance measurement (ft, mt, ...),
arms-reach.settingHintMaximumSoundMeasur: Is the distance calculation used only for the sound
arms-reach.settingNameMaximumDrawingMeas: Maximum drawing interaction distance measurement (ft, mt, ...),
arms-reach.settingHintMaximumDrawingMeas: Is the distance calculation used only for the drawing
arms-reach.settingNameMaximumTileMeasure: Maximum tile interaction distance measurement (ft, mt, ...),
arms-reach.settingHintMaximumTileMeasure: Is the distance calculation used only for the tile
arms-reach.settingNameMaximumWallMeasure: Maximum wall interaction distance measurement (ft, mt, ...),
arms-reach.settingHintMaximumWallMeasure: Is the distance calculation used only for the wall
arms-reach.settingNameMaximumTemplateMea: Maximum template interaction distance measurement (ft, mt, ...),
arms-reach.settingHintMaximumTemplateMea: Is the distance calculation used only for the template
arms-reach.settingNameEnableAdditionalRe: Enable additional reach setting on placeable config sheet
arms-reach.settingHintEnableAdditionalRe: If enable it will let you set a specific value for the specific placeable object
arms-reach.setting.reset.name: Reset settings to default
arms-reach.setting.reset.label: Reset Settings To Default
arms-reach.setting.reset.hint: This will reset all of the settings of back to the active game system's default.
arms-reach.dialogs.resetsettings.title: Reset Module Settings
arms-reach.dialogs.resetsettings.content: Are you sure you want to reset all of the module settings to the current system's defaults? THIS CANNOT BE UNDONE!
arms-reach.setting.debug.name: Enable debugging
arms-reach.setting.debug.label: Prints debug messages to the console
